Name: Identification number of the position
Description: All the different microsites of the observational study (n = 115), the micro-climatology study for *Carex curvula* (n = 14) and the transplantation study (n = 2). Used as connection element.

Name: Identification numer of the site
Description: All the different sites of the observational study (n = 15 ), where each site (approx. 10 x 15 m) contains several microsites (microsites) along a snowmelt gradient. Further, all the sites of the micro-climatology study for *Carex curvula* ( n = 1) and the transplantation study (n = 2).

Name: GPS coordinate (longitude)
Description: Longitudinal GPS coordinate (CH1903+ / LV95) of the site (not the microsite), measured with an iPhone 8 using Altimeter+ (iOS App).

Name: Accuracy of GPS coordinate (longitude)
Description: Accuracy of longitudinal GPS coordinate.

Name: GPS coordinate (latitude)
Description: Latitudinal GPS coordinate (CH1903+ / LV95) of the site (not the microsite), measured with an iPhone 8 using Altimeter+ (iOS App).

Name: Accuracy of GPS coordinate (latitude)
Description: Accuracy of latitudinal GPS coordinate.

Name: Elevation
Description: Elevation of the site (not the microsite), measured with an iPhone 8 using Altimeter+ (iOS App).

Name: Macroexposure in degrees
Description: Exposure of the whole site (in degrees), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using Compass (iOS App).

Name: Macroexposure as geographic direction
Description: Exposure of the whole site (geographic direction), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using Compass (iOS App).

Name: Slope
Description: Slope of the microsite, measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using Protractor (iOS App).

Name: Exposure in degrees
Description: Exposure of the microsite (in degrees), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using Compass (iOS App).

Name: Exposure as geographic direction
Description: Exposure of the microsite (geographic direction), measured with a 50cm-board and an iPhone 8 using Compass (iOS App).

Name: Topography
Description: Micro-topography around the microsite (40x40cm): convex, concave or flat. Estimated by eye.

Name: Soil depth measurement 1
Description: Soil depth around the microsite (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 1).

Name: Soil depth measurement 2
Description: Soil depth around the microsite (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 2).

Name: Soil depth measurement 3
Description: Soil depth around the microsite (15x15cm), measured using a 60cm long metal bar (measurement 3).

Name: Soil depth mean of measurements 1-3
Description: Mean value of the three soil depth measurements around the microsite (15x15cm).

Name: Identification numer of the species
Description: Identification numer of the plant species (tussock grass) of the microsite under which the temperature logger was burried. Used as connection element.

Name: Species
Description: Plant species (tussock grass) of the microsite under which the temperature logger was burried. *Carex curvula (Cc)* or *Nardus stricta (Ns)* or *Helictotrichon versicolor (Hv)* or *Elyna myosuroides (Em)* or *Control (Con)*.

Name: ID_microsite of corresponding control
Description: ID_position of a corresponding control logger (within one meter, without tussock). Note: Not every tussock has a control.

Name: Controlled species 1
Description: Species abbreviation of species 1, which is controlled by this control logger here.

Name: Controlled species 2
Description: Species abbreviation of species 2, which is controlled by this control logger here.

Name: Controlled species 3
Description: Species abbreviation of species 3, which is controlled by this control logger here.

Name: Description
Description: Description of the observational unit and additional notes.
